metadata.description: SPECTRE agentic workflow plugins - Scope, Plan, Execute, Clean, Test, Release, Evaluate.

plugins.name: spectre
plugins.description: SPECTRE Agentic Feature Development Workflow - Scope, Plan, Execute, Clean, Test, Release, Evaluate. Meta-prompting system where prompts invoke subagents that execute specialized prompts.

plugins.name: session-memory
plugins.description: Easy to use Session Memory for Claude Code - /handoff to generate status update, status injected automatically on next session, clear memory with /forget if needed.

plugins.name: learn
plugins.description: Build project level knowledge over time that your Agent automatically loads when relevant. Save patterns, decisions, gotchas, product strategy, and procedures from conversations, and Agent will automatically load them when relevant.
